title: Publisher Correction: Definitions and guidelines for research on antibiotic persistence.
abstract: In Figure 2b, the minimal duration for killing (MDK) 99% of tolerant cells was erroneously labelled as MDK99.99 instead of MDK99. This has now been corrected in all versions of the Review. The publisher apologizes to the authors and to readers for this error.
